about_the_game:
Timeflow is a highly addictive real-life simulator where you can learn valuable finance and life management lessons.

Timeflow provides valuable insights that can help you make better decisions in your own real life. It's a game that entertains, educates, and empowers, all at once.

In Timeflow, you help a character live their life. Characters vary in terms of personal background, age, family status, traits, savings, jobs, assets, and values. To win, the character has to fulfill their life goal and achieve financial freedom.

Here's what you can learn from playing Timeflow:

1. Career Planning: The game allows you to explore different career paths, from employment, freelancing to running your own business. This can give you insights into different work-life choices.

2. Financial Literacy: The game teaches about saving, investing, and managing money. This includes understanding the stock market, real estate investing, and even cryptocurrencies.

3. Risk Management: Timeflow exposes you to different financial risks, such as taking on debt or making risky investments. This can help you understand how to evaluate and manage risks in real-life financial situations.

4. Time Management: Time is a resource in the game, just like in real life. You can learn how to balance work, personal development, and leisure effectively.

5. Life Decisions: In Timeflow, you guide a character through different life stages, making crucial decisions along the way. This can provide a broader perspective on decision-making and long-term planning in real life.

The game is easy to play. You don't need to know complex terms. The interface is simple. There's no micro-management, data tables, and boring charts.

Timeflow is a game that helps you understand life and money better. Start the journey of learning and fun!

Timeflow is based on the best financial education books and business simulators such as Cashflow 101, The Game of Life, Monopoly, Tycoon series, and others by such authors as Robert Kiyosaki, Steven Covey, Richard Branson, Brian Tracy.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any 64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: Intel or Silicon
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Timeflow – Life Sim

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews:
“Timeflow forces you to reckon with your own miserable budget”
Rock Paper Shotgun

“The app helps users play out various life scenarios and learn what happens if you live from payday to payday rather than invest – or if you fail to amass some money by the time you retire.”
ITMO University
short_description: This game will make you rich! Learn the basics of investment and life management. Your goal is to make your dream come true. You can make a career, buy real estate, run business, trade stocks, become a blogger, or make a fortune on an art market. Study, network, and plan your time for all of it.
